## SendableEthersLiquity.withdraw1USDFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw 1USD from Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdraw1USDFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersLiquityTransaction<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                     | Description                 |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------- |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)                                   | Amount of 1USD to withdraw. |
| overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |                             |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [LQTY reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.lqtyreward.md)<!-- -->.
